text: Malek Jaziri was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Corentin Moutet won the title after defeating Quentin Halys 6–3, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Amex-Istanbul Challenger - Singles 2018 Singles
